speaker: agent
text: This is [PERSON_NAME], how can I help you?

speaker: agent
text: So I have a [ORGANIZATION] vehicle and then recently the engine light was on is on and I check it to my [OCCUPATION].

speaker: customer
text: They perform some work but they say there's a software called ECM needs to be updated and it's only available at [ORGANIZATION] dealership.

speaker: agent
text: So I'm just watching, wondering that because I made an appointment tomorrow at your place, but I'm not sure like how long will it take?

speaker: customer
text: Will I be able to like get my vehicle before the end of the day before you close or something?

speaker: agent
text: May I get the phone number the account would be associated with?

speaker: customer
text: Let me see if I can get you with a [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] to let you know how long that's going to take.

speaker: customer
text: Hi, so I just called a [OCCUPATION].

speaker: customer
text: She told me you have an appointment set for tomorrow, but then she said you had a question about something.

speaker: customer
text: So I recently my engine light was on like since last week and then I took it to the [TIME] of my [OCCUPATION] and they perform some work but they say on the next step is to update whatever the ECM software and retest it.

speaker: agent
text: But they say it's only available at [ORGANIZATION] dealership.

speaker: customer
text: So I'm wondering that how long will the process take?

speaker: agent
text: Because I'm thinking if I'm able to get the vehicle before you close.

speaker: agent
text: How do you think if you get it to me today before we close, I could probably have it done for you by the end of the day tomorrow.

speaker: customer
text: Usually the ECM is like an iOS update.

speaker: agent
text: The easiest way to explain it to people.

speaker: customer
text: Sometimes the iOS updates take [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION], sometimes they take [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION].

speaker: customer
text: So if I drop my vehicle today like around [TIME] and you say I'll be able to check it tomorrow before you close?

speaker: agent
text: But I like I'm not able to make an appointment like on the website for today.

speaker: agent
text: Yeah, because we don't do same day appointments then and like.

speaker: customer
text: So is it okay if I just drop my vehicle there today at [TIME]?

speaker: agent
text: Yeah, drop it off and we'll try to work in it.

speaker: customer
text: If not it'll be, it'll get pulled in tomorrow.

speaker: agent
text: Should I provide any information there or should I just repeat the steps.

speaker: customer
text: You're just coming in for ACM reprogram.

speaker: agent
text: I'll put here that you requested it.

speaker: customer
text: Now, whatever issues you're trying to solve, if it doesn't take care of the problem, we are not responsible because we did not diagnose the vehicle.

speaker: agent
text: Is there a base charge for everything they charge for reprogramming?
